languages.text: Существо телепортируется к цели в радиусе 12 клеток и атакует. Цель выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −50 и в случае провала получает {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающий урон{/g}, равный <u>50% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}</u>, и оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинута{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. При успешном прохождении проверки цель получает обычный раздирающий {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от оружия.
languages.original_text: The creature teleports to a target within a 12-cell radius and strikes, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} equal to <u>50% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> and knocking the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If the target successfully passes the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, the strike deals normal weapon rending {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Существо телепортируется к цели в радиусе 12 клеток и атакует. Цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −50 и в случае провала получает {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающий урон{/g}, равный <u>50% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}</u>, и оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинута{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. При успешном прохождении проверки цель получает обычный раздирающий урон от оружия.

Существо телепортируется к цели в радиусе 12 клеток и атакует. Цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −50 и в случае провала получает {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающий урон{/g}, равный <u>50% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}</u>, и оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинута{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. При успешном прохождении проверки цель получает обычный раздирающий урон от оружия.

languages.text: The creature teleports to a target within a 12-cell radius and strikes, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} equal to <u>50% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> and knocking the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If the target successfully passes the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, the strike deals normal weapon rending {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: Существо телепортируется к цели в радиусе 12 клеток и атакует. Цель выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −50 и в случае провала получает {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающий урон{/g}, равный <u>50% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}</u>, и оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинута{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. При успешном прохождении проверки цель получает обычный раздирающий {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от оружия.

traits.locale_text: The creature teleports to a target within 8-cells and strikes, dealing rending damage equal to 50% of the target's maximum wounds and knocking the target prone for 1 round unless they pass a Toughness resistance test with a −50 penalty. If the target successfully passes the resistance test, the strike deals normal weapon rending damage.

The creature teleports to a target within a 12-cell radius and strikes, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} equal to <u>50% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> and knocking the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If the target successfully passes the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, the strike deals normal weapon rending {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

The creature teleports to a target within a 12-cell radius and strikes, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} equal to <u>50% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> and knocking the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If the target successfully passes the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, the strike deals normal weapon rending {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: 此生物传送到12格内的目标附近进行攻击，造成{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}。目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−50{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，若目标未能通过检定，则承受的撕裂伤害等同于<u>最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的50%</u>，而且会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。如果目标成功通过{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，则此次打击仅会造成普通的武器撕裂{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: The creature teleports to a target within a 12-cell radius and strikes, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} equal to <u>50% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> and knocking the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If the target successfully passes the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, the strike deals normal weapon rending {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物传送到8格内的目标附近进行攻击，造成{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}。目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-50{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，若目标未能通过检定，则承受的撕裂伤害等同于最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的50%，而且会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。如果目标成功通过{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，则此次打击仅会造成普通的武器撕裂伤害。

languages.text: その生物は12セル以内のターゲットのところへテレポートして攻撃し、ターゲットの最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}50％分の{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷ダメージ{/g}を与えて1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態にさせる。ターゲットが−50の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}抵抗判定{/g}に成功すれば避けることができる。ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功すれば、その攻撃は通常武器に裂傷{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: The creature teleports to a target within a 12-cell radius and strikes, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} equal to <u>50% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> and knocking the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If the target successfully passes the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, the strike deals normal weapon rending {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: その生物は8セル以内のターゲットのところへテレポートして攻撃し、ターゲットの最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}50％分の{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷ダメージ{/g}を与えて1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態にさせる。ターゲットが−50の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功すれば避けることができる。ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功すれば、その攻撃は通常武器に裂傷ダメージを与える。

languages.text: La criatura se teletransporta a un objetivo a un máximo de 12 celdas y golpea, infligiendo {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}daño acerado{/g} igual al <u>50 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas del objetivo</u> y {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribándolo{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} a menos que supere una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −50. Si el objetivo supera la {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g}, el impacto inflige el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} acerado normal del arma.
languages.original_text: The creature teleports to a target within a 12-cell radius and strikes, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} equal to <u>50% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> and knocking the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If the target successfully passes the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, the strike deals normal weapon rending {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La criatura se teletransporta a un objetivo a un máximo de 8 celdas y golpea, infligiendo {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}daño acerado{/g} igual al 50 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas del objetivo y {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribándolo{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} a menos que supere una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −50. Si el objetivo supera la {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g}, el impacto inflige el daño acerado normal del arma.

languages.text: Die Kreatur teleportiert sich zu einem Ziel innerhalb eines Radius von 12 Feldern und schlägt zu. Dabei verursacht sie {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rüstungsbrechenden Schaden{/g} in Höhe von <u>50 % der maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}</u> des Ziels und belegt es 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang mit {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g}, es sei denn, es besteht eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −50. Wenn das Ziel die {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} besteht, verursacht der Hieb normalen rüstungsbrechenden {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Waffenschaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: The creature teleports to a target within a 12-cell radius and strikes, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} equal to <u>50% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> and knocking the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If the target successfully passes the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, the strike deals normal weapon rending {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Kreatur teleportiert sich zu einem Ziel innerhalb von 8 Feldern und schlägt zu. Dabei verursacht sie {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}durchdringenden Schaden{/g} in Höhe von 50% der maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Ziels und {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}streckt{/g} das Ziel für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} hin, es sei denn, es besteht eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -50. Wenn das Ziel die {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} besteht, verursacht der Hieb normalen durchdringenden Waffenschaden.

languages.text: La créature se téléporte vers une cible dans un rayon de 12 cases. Elle la frappe, lui inflige un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}dégâts de lacération{/g} égal à <u>50 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum de la cible</u> et lui applique l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, sauf si elle réussit un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −50. Si la cible réussit le {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g}, la frappe inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de lacération normaux.
languages.original_text: The creature teleports to a target within a 12-cell radius and strikes, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} equal to <u>50% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> and knocking the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If the target successfully passes the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, the strike deals normal weapon rending {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La créature se téléporte vers une cible dans un rayon de 8 cases et frappe. Cette frappe inflige un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}dégâts perforants{/g} égal à 50 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum de la cible et applique à cette dernière l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, sauf si elle réussit un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -50. Si la cible réussit le {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g}, la frappe inflige des dégâts perforants normaux.

languages.text: Yaratık, en fazla 12 hücre uzaktaki bir hedefe ışınlanarak saldırır. Hedef, −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} direnç {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testinden{/g} geçemezse <u>hedefin maksimum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanının %50'si</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}yırtma hasarı{/g} alır ve {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilir{/g}. Bu etki 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçerse saldırı normal silah yırtma {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: The creature teleports to a target within a 12-cell radius and strikes, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} equal to <u>50% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> and knocking the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If the target successfully passes the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, the strike deals normal weapon rending {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
